constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 98 (Wednesday, June 8, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. RODGERS of Washington:
H.R. 7987.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to ``provide for the common Defence'',
``to raise and support Armies'', and ``to make Rules for the
Government and Regulation of the land and naval Forces'' as
enumerated in Article I, section 8 of the United States
Constitution.
[Page H5409]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East, North Africa and Global Counterterrorism.

title: DEFEND Act of 2022
